```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)

loc <- rep(seq(1:50), times =2)
chrm <-  rep(paste('chr', 1:5, sep=''), each=10, times=2)
#parents <- paste('P', 1:5, sep='')
value = rep(1:5, times=2, each=1)
treat<- rep(paste('T', 1:2, sep=''), each=50, times=1)
f <- data.frame(loc, chrm, parents, treat, value)

chr <-  paste('chr', 1:5, sep='')
parents <- paste('P', 1:3, sep='')
treat <- paste('T', 1:2, sep='')
f <- as.matrix(expand.grid(chr, treat, parents))
f

p <- ggplot(f, aes(x=loc, y=value, size = treat, color=parents)) + geom_point()
p
```
